name: projName
label: Project Name
description: The name of the project for the on-boarded application

name: appName
label: Application Name
description: The name of the application to be on-boarded

name: stages
label: Stage names
description: Comma-separated list of stages for pipeline

name: tiers
label: Tier names
description: Comma-separated list of tiers for both environment and application models

name: buildIp
label: Build Machine
description: Hostname or IP of build machine

name: deployIp
label: Application Server
description: Hostname or IP of application server
